originalTitle: Planned US-funded baby vaccine trial in Guinea-Bissau blasted by WHO
title: Planned US-funded baby vaccine trial in Guinea-Bissau blasted by WHO
content: Giving some newborns in Guinea-Bissau an established hepatitis B treatment but not others is "unethical", it says.

originalTitle: Kenyans drop flowers for Valentine's bouquets of cash. Not everyone is impressed
title: Kenyans drop flowers for Valentine's bouquets of cash. Not everyone is impressed
content: Bouquets of cash have been blooming in popularity in Kenya but recent warnings may slow the trend.

originalTitle: A seat at the table or on the menu? Africa grapples with the new world order
title: A seat at the table or on the menu? Africa grapples with the new world order
content: The US president has shaken up international relations and the continent is working out where it stands.

originalTitle: Zelenskyy says US ‘too often’ pushes Ukraine, not Russia, for concessions
title: Zelenskyy says US ‘too often’ pushes Ukraine, not Russia, for concessions
content: Ukraine's president calls his Russian counterpart a 'slave to war' and accuses Moscow of stalling talks.

originalTitle: LIVE: Israel kills at least nine Palestinians in Gaza since dawn
title: LIVE: Israel kills at least nine Palestinians in Gaza since dawn
content: The killings add to the death toll of 591 since October 10 'ceasefire' that Israel has violated more than 1,600 times.

originalTitle: Cyclone Gezani kills four in Mozambique as Madagascar assesses damage
title: Cyclone Gezani kills four in Mozambique as Madagascar assesses damage
content: Powerful storm batters Mozambique's Inhambane a day after killing at least 41 people in Madagascar.

originalTitle: Iran ready to discuss compromises to reach nuclear deal, minister tells BBC in Tehran
title: Iran ready to discuss compromises to reach nuclear deal, minister tells BBC in Tehran
content: Majid Takht-Ravanchi, Iran's deputy foreign minister, tells the BBC's Lyse Doucet that the ball was "in America's court to prove that they want to do a deal".

originalTitle: Russia killed opposition leader Alexei Navalny using dart frog toxin, UK says
title: Russia killed opposition leader Alexei Navalny using dart frog toxin, UK says
content: There is no innocent explanation for the toxin being found in samples taken from Navalny's body, Foreign Office says.

originalTitle: Rubio says US and Europe 'belong together' despite tensions
title: Rubio says US and Europe 'belong together' despite tensions
content: The US secretary of state reassures European leaders that the Trump administration backs the transatlantic alliance.

originalTitle: 'The officials looked petrified' - was Villa Park chaos advert for VAR?
title: 'The officials looked petrified' - was Villa Park chaos advert for VAR?
content: Newcastle United beat Aston Villa in the FA Cup fourth round in a match dominated by a number of controversial decisions without VAR.

originalTitle: Three years on, Deulofeu is still fighting for 'miracle' return
title: Three years on, Deulofeu is still fighting for 'miracle' return
content: Gerard Deulofeu has not played for more than three years but believes he can make "history" by fighting for a "miracle" comeback.

title: Is Zubimendi Arsenal's best player?
content: After an impressive start to his Arsenal career, BBC Sport looks at whether Martin Zubimendi is the Gunners' most important player.
